Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreeDimShape, TwoDimShape

    class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    First tier class in this Shape Inheritance Hierarchy assignment. All following classes directly or indirectly inherit from this Shape class
